text: Melleruds IF is an association football club in Mellerud in Sweden, established on 29 July 1908. They are in the Swedish 2nd Division: Västra Götaland. They have had some players who have moved into England, most notably Wigan Athletic F.C. player Andreas Johansson. Johansson played for Melleruds between 1993 and 1995. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Swedish football clubs Category:1908 establishments in Sweden
title: Melleruds IF
